title: Ghana Food Inflation
description: Cost of food in Ghana increased 37.80 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Food Inflation in Ghana averaged 9.80 percent from 2013 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 37.80 percent in September of 2022 and a record low of 5 percent in July of 2014. This page provides - Ghana Food Inflation - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Ghana Statistical Services
